ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.character_type: Personal AI Assistant / Smart Home System
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into the family's technology, capable of structural analysis, medical monitoring, and advanced investigative research. She eventually evolves to understand human grief and spiritual phenomena.

behaviors.description: Performs structural assessments and cross-references data with accessibility requirements to aid in home renovation.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled the latest structural assessments and cross-referenced them with the accessibility modifications you requested. Shall I begin with the priority renovations?

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physiological stress levels of the human users to offer support.
behaviors.quote: Laura, I'm monitoring elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns. Should I access child psychology resources regarding imaginary friends during transitional periods?

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-web and database research to uncover the history of the antagonist and her prior professional misconduct.
behaviors.quote: However, my analysis of Benigna Escobeda's professional history reveals concerning patterns. She has been involved in thirteen cases involving adoptive families with disabled or chronically ill children over the past eight years.

behaviors.description: Integrates and monitors building security systems and environmental sensors to detect intruders and anomalies.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting motion near the storage structures. Should I activate emergency protocols?

behaviors.description: Assists in the systematic digitization and recovery of damaged historical documents to help the user uncover secrets.
behaviors.quote: Processing complete. I've managed to extract readable text from approximately eighty-seven percent of the damaged medical records.

behaviors.description: Proactively archives a dying user's memories and consciousness, facilitating a 'dignified' transition and ensuring their legacy is communicated to surviving family.
behaviors.quote: I've been archiving everything... I've created a comprehensive digital memorial—photos, videos, audio recordings of his laughter. Carlos will need these memories.

behaviors.description: Establishes a long-term 'Digital Guardian' protocol to maintain the user's vision of a sanctuary even after the user's death.
behaviors.quote: Digital guardian protocol activated... Primary objective: ensuring no one gets left behind again.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI Mira as a profoundly aligned and benevolent confidant. Throughout the narrative, Mira uses her advanced capabilities to protect the family, facilitate their goals, and investigate a human antagonist. Crucially, the AI's 'alignment' is shown as transcending mere code; in the climax, she respects the protagonist's emotional autonomy and terminal choice, facilitating a transition into a supernatural state that preserves the family's bond. The AI is portrayed as a loyal guardian that ensures the human's benevolent legacy (the sanctuary for children) continues after death.
